title: Does anybody know how do I reduce the size of icons?(Minimap icons)
body: I saw RedMercy's video and I was wondering how do I get to have small icons in game like the Turret's health or minion health and many other stuff,and also the minimap.If you don't know what I'm talking about I'll provide an image:http://imgur.com/a/IHu3D

replies.body: You should be able to change this in-game via interface options.  There will be a scroll option for UI Scaling, and moving it to the left should shrink it.  I hope that helps!
